entries.@subtitles_pve_horde_sullivan_activity_c: Congratulations, team! Another trophy to the pile.
Congratulations, team! Keep up the good work.
entries.@subtitles_pve_horde_velasquez_activity_: Brilliant execution, squad! Let us proceed now.
Excellent work. I'm proud of you, team.
You've done it. Great teamwork out there!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_01:
Girls and boys, last time we were so quick to storm this facility that we might have missed some valuable data.
I need you to scour the complex once again, but this time, more thoroughly.
Be sure to send me any data you come across.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_02:
Sorry for making you get your feet wet!
Let's hope we can find some storage devices that survived this deluge…
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_03: I've got the data from that one! Good find! Keep looking for more.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_04: That was the last of them! Nice work! Proceed to the exit, and prep for extraction.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_05:
Team, I'm afraid we have attracted Strafer attention with these unauthorized uploads.
You'll have to deal with the landing party before we can send evac.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_06: All clear, team! The shuttle will pick you up at the top of the lighthouse! Head over there!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_07: Team, hold out for a little longer! The shuttle is on its way!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_08: All right, children, the school bus is here! Get in, and let's go home.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_sunken_hughes_09:
Okay, so these Strafers were exposing human subjects to Red Salt—well, that part was pretty obvious…
But what's interesting is that, for some reason, they didn't expect the subjects to turn.
I'm getting numerous records of some 'Essence of Trial' being injected directly in the bloodstream.
This must be what they did to Kioni! Oh, Doctor Velasquez owes you a treat!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_01:
All right, people, the Chosen is gone, but I'm afraid this isn’t over.
The Strafers have called in reinforcements, and your only route to extraction is back through that wretched base. Let's go!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_02:
The Strafers have activated force barriers to keep you inside the perimeter.
Clear the facility, and you'll be able to switch these barriers off.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_03: Team, you are doing well! Turn off the barriers and proceed to the helipad.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_04:
All clear… ah, but the helipad is wired!
It'll blow our shuttle to pieces if we try to land.
Team, you must head over to the original LZ!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_05: Another Strafer platoon has arrived! You know the drill!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_06:
Nice work, team! You are almost there.
Proceed to the landing zone, and signal for extraction.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_08: There! The comm station! Restart it, so I can have a clear GPS signal.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_09:
Well done, team! The signal is clear as day.
Standby for evac. You totally earned some R&R.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_escape_hughes_10:
Heads up, team! I'm reading a massive bioform signature… Ah, it's a Stilt!
Places like these don't ever let you go easily, do they?
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_01:
Team, I'm getting a strange signature from the beacon that we planted on that Strafer base.
Judging from the readings, we may be dealing with a new strain of the Crystalline!
I need you to scour the base and locate the source of this abnormality.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_02:
Okay, first we need to turn the power back on.
Activate the generator, and standby for system reboot.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_03: Ah, the place is swarming with Glassheads! It's like something is attracting them here…
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_04: Lights on! Let's see if we can track this anomaly. Give me access to the local network.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_05:
Entering the system… Guys, I need an overriding passcode.
Try the commander's console. Main building, second floor.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_06:
All right, tracking the anomaly now… Got it!
It's one of the containers in the courtyard! Check it!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_07:
Whoa! That stuff surely looks different…
Team, we've got to take this cargo home.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_08:
Team, I'm reading a massive Glasshead presence!
Whatever it is in that container, the Zone doesn't like it!
Get on the walls, and prep for Glasshead assault!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_09: Here they come! Don't let them breach the gate!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_10:
Guys, the Thunderbird has arrived! Let's use it for air support!
Find a comm station, connect to the UAV, and you'll be able to direct the air strikes manually!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_11: Pretty awesome, right? Let's not waste missiles, though. Save them for the tough ones.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_12: Team, they have broken through the gate! Protect the cargo!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_13: Ah… they are destroying the container!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_14: Cargo eliminated… We've failed this one, team.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_15: Last wave, people! Stand your ground for a little longer!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_bastion_hughes_16:
You did it! The Zone is exhausted… well, for now.
Let's grab the cargo and get out of here. Great job, everyone!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_01:
Team, the Strafers have deployed one of their electromagnetic coils on this island.
These coils are designed to facilitate the growth of Crystalline constructs.
To disable this effect, we'll need to turn off the positive polarity nodes, and preserve the negative ones. I'd best explain it on the go.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_02:
Okay, let's start with the one on the roof of the central building.
Get up there and switch that node off!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_03:
Nice work! Now the opposite negative node began attracting the Zone's attention.
Head over to it and protect it from Glasshead assault.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_04: There's our node! Don't let the Glassheads destroy it!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_05: Ah, the node is destroyed… Abort mission. We'll try again another time.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_06: Doing great, team! I've marked the next positive node on your radar. Expect Strafer resistance!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_07: This one's off! Marvelous! Now hurry to the opposite negative node!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_08: All right, you know the drill. Keep the Glassheads away from the node!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_09: Excellent work! There is only one more node to disable, and we'll short-circuit this hellish device!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_starfall_hughes_10:
You've done it, team! The coil is officially sabotaged.
These Strafers will think twice before setting up something like this again.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_01:
Okay, team. Let's take a closer look on that Crystalline Core you've blown up earlier.
Call on the scanner drone when you reach the spot. And, as always, beware of Glassheads!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_02:
Aha! So it turned into one of those… Transmutators, or whatever the Doc is calling them.
You've dealt with their kind before, haven't you? The trick is to put down the runners before they reach the Core.
If you let a runner through, you've got yourselves an Adamant!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_03: All right, the little bee is working. Give it some time.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_04:
We've collected the data! That was… fairly easy.
Now, the hard part will be getting you out of the Zone. A sandstorm is rapidly approaching from the east.
I'm going to guide you to the nearest comm station, but be ready to fight your way through.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_05: Careful! These corridors are swarming with glass hounds!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_06: Ah, so the Strafers have reinforced their outpost. Clear them out and make your way to the gate!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_07:
Okay, team. The sandstorm has caught up with you.
The comm station is not far, but the visibility is limited. Proceed with caution!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_08: Guys, don't be an easy target for those snipers! Take one step at a time!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_09: There's the comm station! Clear it of the enemy forces!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_10: Okay, we have a signal. Dispatching the Bronto, ETA three minutes! Hold on!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_backstab_hughes_11: Excellent work, team! Hop on. Let's get you out of this wretched place!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_01:
Hey, team! Doctor Velasquez wants to track down a so-called interdimensional bubble.
A rare anomaly that has something to do with the Red Realm.
I was lucky to catch one on my radar, not far from here.
Let's see what the fuss is about, shall we?
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_02:
Well, I can see why they call it a bubble…
The doctor's notes here say that these things don't last long.
Follow the anomaly. We need to take a peek through its membrane.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_03: Ah, it's clearly weakening, guys. The membrane is all but invisible…
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_04:
And the bubble is gone. Couldn't get much readings from it… but guess what?
I think we can use a Strafer device in the nearby tunnel to summon another one!
We'll have to clear their hideout first, though. Let's get on to it!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_05:
Here it is, the Strafer hideout.
Your path lies towards the abandoned metro station.
Beware: they've called in reinforcements.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_06:
Nice work so far! Now, onto the fun part. There is an electromagnetic field generator on the station ahead.
Once active, it will attract every Glasshead in these tunnels, so you'll have to defend it for a minute or so.
Then, if my theory is correct, we'll get ourselves a brand new bubble! Let's give it a shot!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_07: Good, the generator is working. Keep it safe, team!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_08:
Ha! We did it, people. You are now inside the interdimensional bubble!
Try to keep up with it while I gather data from your environment sensors.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_09:
Guys, I'm receiving loads of sweet data!
Tell the science team they owe you a month-worth supply of pizza, no less!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_10: The bubble has nearly evaporated! Just a few more readings, hang on!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cybtrail_hughes_11:
Excellent work here, team! Now we know how to conjure these bubbles at will.
Might come in handy in our Red Realm investigations… Prep for evac.
Always a pleasure guiding you on these missions.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_01:
Team, something very strange is happening around the crash site of our stratospheric vessel.
We are getting signs of an electromagnetic disturbance, atypical for the regular Crystalline.
It pains me to return here… but we must investigate.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_02:
Ah, mierda! Of course, those wretched Chosen are involved. Who else could that be…
Team, I need you to peek inside that portal and bring me a sample of whatever you find there!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_03: Is this some… pocket dimension? Astonishing! Grab a sample of that purple crystal and bring it to the storage bin.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_04: Guys, protect the gateway while your teammate is inside!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_05: Another rift detected! Go for it!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_06: One more rift on my sensors! Ah, this Chosen must be toying with us!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_07:
Nice work here, team. Me and my people will get to the bottom of this purple strain. Now, these Strafers are based in the nearby mountain pass.
How about we drop by and say hello? By which, of course, I mean raze their operation to the ground!
And if you happen to encounter that Chosen fellow, please make it clear to him that we will not tolerate his dancing on our people's bones!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_08:
There! Huh. Smart fortification, I'm sure the Commander would have given it credit…
But no matter! Get up there, team, and leave no stone unturned!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_09: You've cleared this snake den… Great job. Proceed to the exit, but beware of those nasty glass flies.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_10:
What in the name of goodness are these Chosen up to? Commanding the crystal?
Bending it to their will? As if the alien plague itself wasn't enough…
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_11:
So, this coward won't even fight us? Don't worry, we'll get to him and his lackeys soon enough.
Now cut these Stilts down to size, and let's be done with it…
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_12: Those lightning rods are healing the creatures! Turn them off!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_twins_velasquez_13:
Excellent work, people. Evac shuttle is on approach. Commander and I will have a serious talk.
We need a plan how to deal with these Chosen once and for all!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cargo_velasquez_01:
Ground team! The Strafers are trying to steal the cargo that we were moving out of the Zone.
Catch up with the raiding party, and take that cargo back! Let's go.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cargo_velasquez_02: Team, you need to stay close to the cart. That way, it'll follow the intended route.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cargo_velasquez_03: Guys, you need to take control of the cart!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cargo_velasquez_04:
We have the cargo! Nice work… but the mission isn't over just yet.
That thing we extracted… the Zone will not let it go easily.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cargo_velasquez_05: Here we go, squad! Destroy the anomaly, and the cargo is safe with us!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_cargo_velasquez_06: It's done! I knew we could rely on you, team. Evac shuttle inbound. Great work!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_liberty_velasquez_0:
Team, I received a disturbing intelligence report. The Strafers brought Doctor Queen's body to their secret lab, which should be located somewhere around here.
Lily did not deserve turning into that… monster, and she will not be a tool for their horrendous rituals!
We must give her… a proper burial. We owe her that much. Don't let me down, squad.
They must be using the old fallout shelter beneath the island. Look for the underground entrance!
There's the entrance! Nice work. Clear the guards, and take the elevator down.

Okay, there are two wings in this bunker.
First, you'll have to clear the tech wing and obtain the security codes.
Then we'll use those codes to enter the bio wing. Lily is there, I can feel it!
Squad, beware of scanners. Avoid those lasers at any cost!
Guys, take it one step at a time. This is their territory, not ours. You must be careful!
There! That's the main terminal! Log in and standby for the pass codes.
We have the codes! Team, I knew I could count on you. Unlock the bio wing, and find Lily!

Dios mio, the Crystalline is… all over this place.
Beware the creatures, team. And try to avoid those lightning traps…
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_liberty_velasquez_1: There! Oh, God… Lily! Is she breathing? Someone, check her vitals, now!
What did they do to you? Team, we need to extract her!

What the… Of course. It all makes sense now. Squad… I'm afraid our search was in vain.
Doctor Queen… isn't here, and she never was. I'm not even sure it was her whom we encountered at that crash site.
Let's get out of this wretched place. I'll send evac as soon as you're back at the surface.
Team, I am in your debt. Thank you… for giving me clarity. Velasquez out.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_01:
We need to look into this 'teleportation' tech that the Strafers are using.
My theory is that they are creating micro clusters within the Red Realm. Let's find out how they do it.

Team, we are detecting suspicious Strafer activity in this area.
They have somehow opened a gateway to the Red Realm.
I need you to investigate, and if possible, obtain a piece of this technology.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_02:
These landing pods are clearly using teleportation.
Although, 'interdimensional traversal' would be a better term for it…
In any event, the gateway must be nearby. Keep looking!

These landing pods are a perfect example of applied teleportation.
Although, 'interdimensional travel' would be a better way to call it…
Team, the portal must be here somewhere!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_03: Careful! Those crystal… 'lotuses' don't seem to be fond of company.
Watch how you go! The carapaces submerge if you linger for too long!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_04: There! That device must be keeping the gateway open. Clear the area, team!
There! That's the teleporter we've been looking for! Hold out until it opens up a rift!
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_05:
Team! Can you hear me? Listen: you are inside the micro cluster.
I need you to grab a piece of hardware that maintains the gateway.
Look around — but be careful!

Ground team? Oh, we have connection. Good.
You are now in the Red Realm, but don't worry, it's just a tiny cluster.
Look for Strafer hardware that keeps this place running.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_06: Yes! This is exactly what we came here for. Now weaken the Crystalline here to destroy the cluster.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_portal_velasquez_07:
Nice work, team. Now we should be able to open those rifts ourselves.
The thing's dangerous — but with luck, we'll give these Strafers a taste of their own medicine.
entries.@subtitles_pve_short_quicksand_phillips_:
You saw who?! Impossible! He's been…
Team, I need you to report everything you've seen and heard up to this moment!
Every last bit, understood? We gotta get you out of there first, though.
I'm taking a bird. Rendez-vous in ten minutes! Over.

Team, I'm headed your way. Don't know what kind of wasp nest you've poked, but it's striking lightning bolts all over the place.
Here's the rendezvous coordinates. Get you asses over there and make it quick!

Damn storm! I can't land here, need a high ground.
Head over to the city ruins. I'll try to clear the path for you.
Okay, I'm at the ruins. No storm here, but I detect a Strafer platoon rapidly approaching. Hurry up!

How do you like this, motherfuckers? Ha-ha, just like old times!
Team, I'm gonna pick you up once the landing is clear!
You goddamn lunatics! How many more of you do we got to kill? Let's deal with this last batch, fellas!

Finally, a clear landing spot. Get in, people!
I want to see your reports on my table as soon as we get to base!
